summary.para: The MIB_UDPSTATS2 structure contains statistics for the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) running on the local computer. This structure is different from structure in that it uses 64-bit counters, rather than 32-bit counters.

remarks.para: The function returns a pointer to a MIB_UDPSTATS2 structure.

summary.para: The number of datagrams received that were discarded because the port specified was invalid.
The number of erroneous datagrams received. This number does not include the value contained by the dwNoPorts member.
The number of entries in the UDP listener table.
